content.html: Did you know that in #Golang we can write executable examples? They're automatically included in our package documentation, they can run directly in a web browser, and they're also automatically checked every time we run 'go test'. It's pretty neat! bitfieldconsulting.com/golang/examples
content.value:
Did you know that in #Golang we can write executable examples? They're automatically included in our package documentation, they can run directly in a web browser, and they're also automatically checked every time we run 'go test'. It's pretty neat!

bitfieldconsulting.com/golang/examples
